## Date Functions


`ADDDATE("2017-06-15", INTERVAL 10 DAY):` add date adding 10 days to given date

`CURRENT_DATE() :`  return current date


`DATE("2017-06-15") :` extract date part


`DATEDIFF(END_DATE, START_DATE) :` returns difference in days


`DATE_ADD("2017-06-15", INTERVAL 10 DAY) :` add date adding 10 days to given date


`DAY("2017-06-15") :` Return the day of the month for a date:


`DAYNAME("2017-06-15") :` Return the weekday name for a date:


`HOUR("2017-06-20 09:34:00") :` Return the hour part of a datetime:

`MONTH("2017-06-15") :` Return the month part of a date:

`SUBDATE("2017-06-15", INTERVAL 10 DAY) :` Subtract 10 days from a date and return the date


`WEEK("2017-10-25") :` Return the week number for a date:


`YEAR("2017-06-15") :` Return the year part of a date:
